name: Flight of the Bin Chicken
description:
Behold! Nature's greatest creation yet. 

Feast your eyes upon the peak of evolution - an animal adapted so perfectly to the majestic cityscape that it can feed on absolutely anything. Anything.

Lesser people might call this specimen an "Australian White Ibis", but those in the know call it by its true name. We whisper it on university campuses and shout it at rooftops. 

(Fucking!) Bin Chicken

Flight of the Bin Chicken is the Lunar Lander + Flappy Bird crossover nobody asked for but which we all deserve.

Fly through the skies and consume all the trash. Whatever you do, don't let the humans force their knowledge upon you!

Controls:

  • Space to flap your pathetic wings!
  • Left and Right Arrow to change your pathetic trajectory!

A project made with love by OuterCube

- Aidan, Adam, Marcus and Noah
